name: KillTheCube
description:
Keep this game updated with my launcher -> MisickGamesLancher

Third gamemode called Adlerka is my school.
To do: fix aim, better settings with mouse sensitivity, 2nd floor of school, more enemies to adlerka gamemode, some creepy stuff.

Game is made with 3 gamemodes:
First gamemode called Arena:
You have to destroy as many cubes as possible! You can get 3 Achievements per game!
Second gamemode, Waves:
Be careful, they may be behind you!
The longer you live, the harder it will be!
Third gamemode, Adlerka:
You don't have to worry at all.
Find the key and escape through the main entrance!

Controls:
WASD - walk
SPACE - jump
L.SHIFT - sprint
MOUSE - look
R.MOUSE - shoot
L.MOUSE - aim
F - flashlight
; - console
